plot: Mr. Morimoto is a japanese exiled to Paris since he is retired. He came to make his old dream come true: to lead the bohemian life of a Parnassian painter...
title: Monsieur Morimoto
plot_es: Mr. Morimoto is a japanese exiled to Paris since he is retired. He came to make his old dream come true: to lead the bohemian life of a Parnassian painter...
